content.text: If the length of equal side is x, then the equation for perimeter is ?

solution.text:
We don't know the length of the equal sides.So,let the length of the equal side be x.
According to question:
x + x + \(\frac {_{j}_}{3} = {_{j}_}\frac {2}{15}\)
x + x + \(\frac {_{j}_}{3} = \frac {(15 \times _{j}_) + 2}{15}\)
2x + \(\frac {_{j}_}{3}\) = \(\frac {(15 \times _{j}_) + 2}{15}\)
